data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Duarte, Marcelo (2017): Revision of the Neotropical moth genus Ptychotrichos Schaus (Lepidoptera, Erebidae, Arctiinae, Arctiini, Ctenuchina).
